channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Ah Neo
channel.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Escape Routes.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-10.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: Enjoy a warm kitty-welcome at the famous hot spring area! After visiting a popular cat duo at a ropeway station, stop by at a restaurant run by a kitty and its owner where you can also bathe.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ekiben Japan
channel.desc: In Nagaoka, there's an ekiben shaped by layers of tradition, featuring chicken meatballs with local chili, 100-year-old abura-age, thrice-pickled eggplants in miso and more, each with their own story.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.
